name: A story told by the stars
name_original: A story told by the stars
description:
Hi! We are Aaron and Lau, a couple of Spanish indie gamedevs which love to create games with narrative that reaches people's heart. 

We'd be so thankfull if you rate this game when you finish it and follow us on our social media:
